original_text: So I exhort the elders among you, as a fellow elder and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, as well as a partaker in the glory that is going to be revealed:
korean_text: 너희 중 장로들에게 권하노니 나는 함께 장로 된 자요 그리스도의 고난의 증인이요 나타날 영광에 참여할 자니라

sentences.original_text: So I exhort the elders among you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나는 너희 중 장로들에게 권면하노니

sentences.original_text: and a witness of the sufferings of Christ
as well as a partaker in the glory
that is going to be revealed:
